main event: A round, reddish-green object the size of a dime was observed falling in a northwest direction at Westover AFB, Massachusetts on December 3, 1957.
interesting points: The object had a reddish-orange tail.
The sighting was reported by both civilian and military witnesses.
The object was observed from a B-52 aircraft at 38,000 feet.
The object disappeared into an overcast sky.
The sighting was determined to have the characteristics of a fireball.
sighted object: Round, reddish-green object the size of a dime with a reddish-orange tail
